title: S&P upped jurisdiction ranking assessment for India’s insolvency regime to Group B
description: The statement also said that India’s resolution regime still lags those of more established Group A and some Group B jurisdictions, average recovery rates of about 30 per cent are comparatively low
content: S&P Global Ratings on Wednesday revised up its jurisdiction ranking assessment for Indias insolvency regime to Group B from Group C. This showed improvement in insolvency resolution process but c… [+3623 chars]
